item.title: GitHub Pages Deployment
item.description: 1. Overview linkGitHub Pages provides quick, SSL-secured static hosting for personal, organizational, or project pages directly from a GitHub repository. Using GitHub Actions, this service simplifies development workflows and builds. 2. Prerequisites link A GitHub Account Git Create a Hugo site using the Lotus Docs theme 3. Procedure link1. Create a new repository on GitHub linkCreate a new repository on GitHub, e.g., https://github.com/joaoAAG/Tecaa.git 2. Change GitHub Pages Source to GitHub Actions linkVisit your GitHub repository and navigate to Settings > Pages.
